channel.title: Product on AI Timeline
channel.description: Recent content in Product on AI Timeline

item.title: Deepseek R1 Release
item.description: Brief description of the AI event and its significance.

item.title: MrBeast AI Thumbnail Tool Controversy
item.description:
MrBeast, a prominent YouTuber with over 408 million subscribers, faced significant backlash for launching an AI thumbnail tool that allowed users to generate thumbnails by referencing existing YouTube channels without consent, leading to accusations of plagiarism and ethical concerns from other creators like Jacksepticeye.

In response to the criticism, MrBeast decided to remove the AI thumbnail tool from his ViewStats platform and instead introduced a feature where creators can commission real thumbnail artists, aiming to support the artistic community and address the ethical issues raised.

item.title: GPT-4o Release
item.description:
On May 13, 2024, OpenAI announced GPT-4o, a new flagship model that can reason across audio, vision, and text in real time. It is available in the free tier and to Plus users with higher message limits.

Content of the event goes here.

item.title: GPT-4 Release
item.description: On March 14, 2023, OpenAI released GPT-4, a large multimodal model that can solve difficult problems with greater accuracy than previous models, thanks to its broader general knowledge and problem-solving abilities. It can accept image and text inputs and emit text outputs.

item.title: ChatGPT Release
item.description: On November 30, 2022, OpenAI launched ChatGPT, a conversational AI model that quickly gained widespread popularity for its ability to generate human-like text, answer questions, and assist with a wide range of tasks.
